name: Marble Queen Pothos
des: Give your home office an upgrade! The Pothos Marble and its quick growing vines full of variegated green and white leaves will make any space look more lush. It is a great low maintenance choice for beginners.

name: Fiddle Leaf Fig
des: The Fiddle Leaf Fig is famous for its broad, vibrant green leaves with prominent veining. It prefers a stable environment and can be fickle when temps fluctuate. Keep it in bright light, and water about once every 1–2 weeks.

name: Monstera Deliciosa
des: Nicknamed the “swiss cheese plant”, the Monstera deliciosa is famous for its quirky natural leaf holes. These holes are theorized to maximize sun fleck capture on the forest floor. Depending on the season and maturity of the plant, your Monstera could arrive with no holes just yet. Arrives in a nursery grow pot nestled inside our ceramic planter.

name: Faux Rex Begonia
des: Our artificial Rex Begonia gives your space a long-lasting pop of color with vibrant purple veining and a slight iridescent sheen. It comes paired with our Grant ceramic pot for a realistic look.

name: Faux Calathea Medallion
des: Enhance a dark corner with this 3.65' tall patterned faux Calathea Medallion, ideal for adding color and height. Paired with your choice of our ceramic (Prospect) and fiberglass (Pallas) floor planters for a more polished look.

name: Macramé Plant Hanger
des: These macramé plant hangers are a modern spin on the traditional. Boasting gorgeous mid-century inspired colors, these hangers are a great way to merge your love for home decor and plant-care. Pair it with your favorite hanging plant in one of our small or medium planters and you’re good to go.

name: Sunrise Vase
des: Named for the beautiful details found in ambrosia maple and its circular shape, the Maple Sunrise Propagation Vase adds a minimalist-style focal point to your walls. Decorate and propagate your houseplants at the same time

name: Shangri-La Rose
des: This Rose Adaptogen has a delicate, fragrant taste between its rosy notes and slightly tangy, fruity notes. Naturally caffeine free, vegan and rich in antioxidants, you'll watch in wonder as the flower unfurls. Pour hot water over 1 flower in a cup and use bamboo tongs to keep the flower submerged. As you infuse, enjoy the visual splendor then sip and enjoy.

name: Holiday Wreath
des: Spruce up your space for the holiday season with our live evergreen wreath. Made from fraser fir, white pine and juniper, it will add both festive fragrance and charm to your home. Wreath measures 24 inches in diameter.

name: Holiday Gift
des: Make any plant a gift with a Holiday Gift Message Pop! Choose between two festive sayings that can be popped directly into your plant upon arrival for the ultimate festive feeling. Ceramic pops measure 5.5' tall x 1.5' wide.

name: Norfolk Island Pine
des: Decorate your home for the holidays with our Norfolk Island Pine Tree. A lively addition to your home all year round, the Norfolk is actually a tropical evergreen native to Norfolk Island in the Pacific Ocean. For a festive vibe, consider decorating it with ornaments of your choice.

name: Succulent Assortment
des: This exclusive set is perfect for a small windowsill, and hard to kill. You’ll get a variety of six potted succulents for the price of five. That’s one free potted succulent to gift to a friend! We will do our best to match your assortment to what is pictured.

name: Coffee Plant
des: You might be surprised to know the same plant that grows your morning coffee beans is a popular, low maintenance houseplant! Although it’s unlikely this plant will produce berries inside, its attractive shiny green foliage will liven up any interior space.

name: Sansevieria Moonshine
des: The Sansevieria Moonshine is a variety of snake plant popular for its succulent characteristics, compact shape, and unique silvery green foliage. A multitasker, the snake plant purifies indoor air by removing toxins such as formaldehyde, xylene, and toluene.

name: Money Tree Plant
des: The Money Tree is a popular houseplant because of its resilience, ease of growth, and fun braided trunk.

name: Parlor Palm
des: The Parlor Palm is a favorite easy-care palm with tropical fronds known for its air purifying qualities. Arrives in a nursery grow pot nestled inside our ceramic planter.
